attributes.action: End the UK’s membership of the World Health Organisation
attributes.additional_details: We are concerned that the recent amendments proposed to the WHO International Health Regulations may make it easier for the WHO to be used as a mechanism to wrest sovereignty away from democratically elected governments, by strengthening the WHO's authority to declare public health emergencies. Whilst public health is important, we cannot allow it to be used as a smokescreen to undermine our democratic rights.
attributes.background: Far from being "dedicated to the wellbeing of all people and guided by science" as it claims, we believe the World Health Organisation (WHO) has shown it serves the pharmaceutical industry and not the interests of the people. We call upon the UK to withdraw from the WHO without delay.
